Text: Does the video skip for anyone else?

Hey buddy....try VLC player...it has worked for DVD's for me in the past...also, InterActual DVD player might work...I am sure you can find a download for it somewhere....if you can do either of those, check your codecs for windows media player...K-Lite pack full or AceMega Codec pack should do the trick....
